(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Report))
        (CC and)
        (NP
          (NP (NNS photos))
          (PP (IN by)
            (NP (NNP Joao)))))
      (VP
        (VP (VB Meet))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VB Eat)
          (NP (NN Session))
          (ADVP (RB Recently)))))
    (NP (DT some) (NNS readers))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (NP (DT a) (NN crash) (NN course))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NN sushi)))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP ieatishootipost) (NNP Sushi) (NNP Appreciation) (NNP Workshop))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(Meet-6, Report-1)
cc(Report-1, and-2)
conj(Report-1, photos-3)
prep(photos-3, by-4)
pobj(by-4, Joao-5)
dep(got-13, Meet-6)
cc(Meet-6, and-7)
conj(Meet-6, Eat-8)
dobj(Eat-8, Session-9)
advmod(Eat-8, Recently-10)
det(readers-12, some-11)
nsubj(got-13, readers-12)
root(ROOT-0, got-13)
det(course-16, a-14)
nn(course-16, crash-15)
dobj(got-13, course-16)
prep(got-13, in-17)
pobj(in-17, sushi-18)
prep(got-13, at-19)
det(Workshop-24, the-20)
nn(Workshop-24, ieatishootipost-21)
nn(Workshop-24, Sushi-22)
nn(Workshop-24, Appreciation-23)
pobj(at-19, Workshop-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Sushi)
      (CC and)
      (NNP sushi-know-how))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBN dished)
        (PRT (RP out))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (JJ equal) (NN measure)))
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP chef) (NNP Thomas) (NNP Kok))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Hokkaido) (NNP Sushi) (NNP Restaurant)))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (PP (IN Throughout)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN course))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN afternoon)))))
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBD learned)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN difference))
        (PP (IN between)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ left-facing) (JJ sole) (NN fish))
            (CC and)
            (NP
              (NP (JJ right-facing) (JJ sole) (NN fish))
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (PRP We))
                  (VP (VBD learned)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN difference))
                      (PP (IN between)
                        (NP (NN maguro))))))))
            (, ,)))))))

(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC and)
    (NP
      (NP (NN otoro))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP We))
          (VP (VBD ate)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (DT all) (CD three))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP We))
                      (VP (VBD watched)
                        (SBAR
                          (S
                            (NP (NNP chef) (NNP Thomas))
                            (VP (VBP cut)
                              (PRT (RP up))
                              (NP
                                (NP (DT a) (NN range))
                                (PP (IN of)
                                  (NP (NN fish))))
                              (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                                (PP (IN with)
                                  (NP (JJ running) (NN commentary)))
                                (-RRB- -RRB-))))))))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP We))
                      (VP (VBD ate)))))
                (VP (VBD said)
                  (NP (NN fish))
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (NNP chef) (NNP Thomas))
                      (VP (VBD broke)
                        (PRT (RP down))
                        (SBAR
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP We))
                            (VP (VBD were)
                              (VP (VBN warned)
                                (S
                                  (VP (TO to)
                                    (VP
                                      (ADVP (RB never))
                                      (VB order)
                                      (NP (NN eel) (NN sushi)

                                        (NN egg))
                                      (PP (IN at)
                                        (NP
                                          (NP (DT the) (NN start))
                                          (PP (IN of)
                                            (NP (DT a) (NN sushi) (NN meal)))))
                                      (SBAR
                                        (S
                                          (NP (PRP We))
                                          (VP (VBD ate)
                                            (NP (DT some) (NN eel) (NN sushi))))))))))))))))))))))))
